definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
white whale/beluga/Moby Dick, novel by Herman Melville 赫曼·麥爾維爾|赫曼·麦尔维尔[He4 man4 · Mai4 er3 wei2 er3]

sentences.english: It is believed that the sperm whale dives deeper than any other cetacean.
sentences.chinese: 人們相信，抹香鯨比其他鯨類動物潛得更深。

sentences.english: These three humpbacks came over to me to check me out.
sentences.chinese: 這三隻座頭鯨游到我這來打量我。

sentences.english: Existing beaked whale populations are found in nearly every ocean.
sentences.chinese: 在每個大洋幾乎都能見到突吻鯨的身影。

sentences.english: In fact, the Japanese whale meat to the restaurant and hotel, just want to get rich.
sentences.chinese: 其實日本人把鯨肉送到菜館和飯店裏，就想發財。

sentences.english: Every humpback has a different pattern of spots, just as human fingerprints are all different.
sentences.chinese: 每頭座頭鯨的尾部斑點都不同，就如同人類的指紋。

sentences.english: Such as seals, penguins, polar bear and it's narwhal's home.
sentences.chinese: 比如海豹，企鵝，北極熊，那裏還是獨角鯨的故鄉。

sentences.english: Japanese whale hunters plan to capture 50 humpback whales in the Antarctic in the coming months.
sentences.chinese: 日本捕鯨者計劃下月在南極捕捉50頭駝背鯨。

sentences.english: The sperm whale does not feed on small fish like other whales.
sentences.chinese: 巨頭鯨不象其它鯨一樣以小魚爲主食。

sentences.english: The sperm whale does not feed on small fish like other whales.
sentences.chinese: 巨頭鯨不象其它鯨一樣以小魚爲主食。

sentences.english: Humpback whales hold the world's record for longest mammalian voyage.
sentences.chinese: 座頭鯨保持著世界上哺乳動物中遷徙距離最長的記錄。

sentences.english: Many people have been seeing these two Narwhals every single day.
sentences.chinese: 有一頭被衝到岸上的死鯨，它是兩頭獨角鯨的媽媽。

sentences.english: Many people have been seeing these two Narwhals every single day.
sentences.chinese: 有一頭被衝到岸上的死鯨，它是兩頭獨角鯨的媽媽。

sentences.english: A whale is a huge animal, it is full of treasure.
sentences.chinese: 鯨是一種龐大的動物，它的身上全是寶。

sentences.english: I began to think that this small-brained thing might be a very early whale.
sentences.chinese: 我猜想那個小腦動物很可能就是早期鯨。

sentences.english: Whale songs become "hits" that can spread halfway around the globe.
sentences.chinese: 鯨類們有自己的“流行歌曲”，它能傳遍半個地球。

definition: legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods
the northern part of the country/the North
insect or insect-like small creature (literary)/base person (used as a curse word)
to visit places famous for their scenery
to hasten/to run/to open up/to gallop
